Header: Previous government alleged to have committed a huge tax fraud on the country by re-exporting ethanol
Content: The Sinhale Organisation points out that the previous government has committed a huge tax fraud on the country by re-exporting ethanol. Organizer of the movement Pradeep Sanjeewa Perera said that the previous government even changed the regulations in this regard. Organizer of the Sinhale Organisation Pradeep Sanjeewa Perera said that the product Ethanol was maintained as a racket by the previous government. He said that the previous government has introduced regulations to re-export Ethanol. He said that a methodology should be introduced to get the revenue denied to the government under the pretext of re-exporting ethanol.
